name: SoGoSurvey.com
description: Premium online survey tool but FREE
overview:
SoGoSurvey makes it easy to conduct online survey research and analyze survey data.

Our advanced, powerful solution provides quality results at an affordable price.Our team of spunky sales, energetic engineers, and caring customer service representatives has been the cornerstone of our competitive advantage. We place a strong emphasis on continuous development and innovation, and we think it shows.

Mission: With one of the largest and most talented team of engineers and product designers in the industry, R&D has been the cornerstone of our competitive advantage. We place a strong emphasis on continuous development and innovation. Our reporting module will just wow you. See for yourself!
